onReadyForPlayback().Description: use @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlue#PlayerCallback#onPreparedStateChanged_E@. This method is fired when media is ready for playback @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlue#isPrepared_E@.

ClassDesc: Interface to allow clients to take action once the video is ready to play and start stop.
